lead_paragraph: ZMapp, a potential treatment for Ebola, seemed to prevent death in its first rigorous trial, but researchers said the results were not conclusive.

headline.print_headline: Ebola Drug Shows Signs of Efficacy in Small Trial
headline.main: Ebola Drug Shows Signs of Efficacy in Small Clinical Trial

snippet: ZMapp, a potential treatment for Ebola, seemed to prevent death in its first rigorous trial, but researchers said the results were not conclusive.
abstract: Researchers report Mapp Biopharmaceutical drug ZMapp apparently prevents death from Ebola in its first rigorous clinical trial; say results, however, are inconclusive.
